subject: ACTSC
title: Aggregate Claims Models
description: Mixed Poisson and nonhomogeneous birth processes for claim counts; analytic, recursive, asymptotic and approximate evaluation of compound distributions for aggregate claims; reliability concepts and analysis of stop-loss moments; applications for inflation, incurred but not reported claims, and infinite server queues.  Prerequisites are familiarity with aggregate loss models at the level of ActSc 431/831 or equivalent.
